center.bold: Edward J. Clancy, Appellant, v. Phyllis M. Clancy, Appellee.

court.center: Appellate Court of Illinois, First District.

opinion.syllabus:
HUSBAND AND WIFE, § 214[fn*] — separate maintenance, sufficiencyof evidence to support decree of. Decree of separate maintenance granting wife custody of minor child, support money and attorney's fees, was justified by evidence.
[fn*] See Callaghan's Illinois Digest, same topic and sectionnumber.
opinion.posture:
Appeal from the Superior Court of Cook county; the Hon. ROGER J. KILEY, Judge, presiding.
Decree affirmed. Heard in the second division, first district, this court at the October term, 1941.
opinion.opinion_text: "Not to be published in full." Opinion filed December 30, 1942.
